data.title: Kabul International Airport, Kabul, Afghanistan
data.meta_description: METAR OPPS 150800Z 36014KT 2100 FEW025TCU SCT027 BKN070 34/29 Q1002. The wind is from direction 360° with a speed of 14 kt. Visibility is 2.1 km. The ceiling, broken or more, is 7,000 ft. The temperature and wind chill are 34 °C.
data.text:
METAR Kabul International Airport - OAKB/KBL

Kabul International Airport is a midsized airport in Kabul, Afghanistan. The airport is located at latitude 34.56585 and longitude 69.21240. The airport has one runway: 11/29. The ICAO airport code of this field is OAKB. The airport's IATA code is KBL. The airport is in the Lahore FIR.

This aviation weather observation was made for Peshawar International Airport on August 15, 2024 13:00, local time.

Airport observations

The wind is from direction 360° with a speed of 14 kt.

Visibility is 2.1 km.

There are few clouds towering cumulus at an altitude of 2,500 ft, scattered clouds at an altitude of 2,700 ft and broken clouds at an altitude of 7,000 ft. The ceiling, broken or more, is 7,000 ft.

The temperature and wind chill are 34 °C. The heat index is 49. The dew point is 29 °C, the relative humidity is 75%. The air pressure at sea level is 1002 hPa (QNH).

Daylight period

Today the sun rises at 05:14 and sets at 18:41. This applies to Kabul International Airport, the universal daylight period may be different. The difference between the local time and UTC is +4 hour 30 minutes. Daylight saving time is currently in progress.

Companies

We don't have information about companies on this airport.
